00087 ## This is for searching the disk for directories containing pg files.
00088 ## to make the recursion work, this returns an array where the first 
00089 ## item is the number of pg files in the directory.  The second is a
00090 ## list of directories which contain pg files.
00091 ##
00092 ## If a directory contains only one pg file and the directory name
00093 ## is the same as the file name, then the directory is considered
00094 ## to be part of the parent directory (it is probably in a separate
00095 ## directory only because it has auxiliary files that want to be
00096 ## kept together with the pg file).
00097 ##
00098 ## If a directory has a file named "=library-ignore", it is never
00099 ## included in the directory menu.  If a directory contains a file
00100 ## called "=library-combine-up", then its pg are included with those
00101 ## in the parent directory (and the directory does not appear in the
00102 ## menu).  If it has a file called "=library-no-combine" then it is
00103 ## always listed as a separate directory even if it contains only one
00104 ## pg file.
00105 
00106 sub get_library_sets {
00107     my $top = shift; my $dir = shift;
00108     # ignore directories that give us an error
00109     my @lis = eval { readDirectory($dir) };
00110     if ($@) {
00111         warn $@;
00112         return (0);
00113     }
00114     return (0) if grep /^=library-ignore$/, @lis;
00115 
00116     my @pgfiles = grep { m/\.pg$/ and (not m/(Header|-text)\.pg$/) and -f "$dir/$_"} @lis;
00117     my $pgcount = scalar(@pgfiles);
00118     my $pgname = $dir; $pgname =~ s!.*/!!; $pgname .= '.pg';
00119     my $combineUp = ($pgcount == 1 && $pgname eq $pgfiles[0] && !(grep /^=library-no-combine$/, @lis));
00120 
00121     my @pgdirs;
00122     my @dirs = grep {!$ignoredir{$_} and -d "$dir/$_"} @lis;
00123     if ($top == 1) {@dirs = grep {!$problib{$_}} @dirs}
00124     foreach my $subdir (@dirs) {
00125         my @results = get_library_sets(0, "$dir/$subdir");
00126         $pgcount += shift @results; push(@pgdirs,@results);
00127     }
00128 
00129     return ($pgcount, @pgdirs) if $top || $combineUp || grep /^=library-combine-up$/, @lis;
00130     return (0,@pgdirs,$dir);
00131 }
00132 
00133 sub get_library_pgs {
00134     my $top = shift; my $base = shift; my $dir = shift;
00135     my @lis = readDirectory("$base/$dir");
00136     return () if grep /^=library-ignore$/, @lis;
00137     return () if !$top && grep /^=library-no-combine$/, @lis;
00138 
00139     my @pgs = grep { m/\.pg$/ and (not m/(Header|-text)\.pg$/) and -f "$base/$dir/$_"} @lis;
00140     my $others = scalar(grep { (!m/\.pg$/ || m/(Header|-text)\.pg$/) &&
00141                                 !m/(\.(tmp|bak)|~)$/ && -f "$base/$dir/$_" } @lis);
00142 
00143     my @dirs = grep {!$ignoredir{$_} and -d "$base/$dir/$_"} @lis;
00144     if ($top == 1) {@dirs = grep {!$problib{$_}} @dirs}
00145     foreach my $subdir (@dirs) {push(@pgs, get_library_pgs(0,"$base/$dir",$subdir))}
00146 
00147     return () unless $top || (scalar(@pgs) == 1 && $others) || grep /^=library-combine-up$/, @lis;
00148     return (map {"$dir/$_"} @pgs);
00149 }
00150 
00151 sub list_pg_files {
00152     my ($templates,$dir) = @_;
00153     my $top = ($dir eq '.')? 1 : 2;
00154     my @pgs = get_library_pgs($top,$templates,$dir);
00155     return sortByName(undef,@pgs);
00156 }

00158 ## Search for set definition files
00159 
00160 sub get_set_defs {
00161     my $topdir = shift;
00162     my @found_set_defs;
00163     # get_set_defs_wanted is a closure over @found_set_defs
00164     my $get_set_defs_wanted = sub {
00165         #my $fn = $_;
00166         #my $fdir = $File::Find::dir;
00167         #return() if($fn !~ /^set.*\.def$/);
00168         ##return() if(not -T $fn);
00169         #push @found_set_defs, "$fdir/$fn";
00170         push @found_set_defs, $_ if m|/set[^/]*\.def$|;
00171     };
00172     find({ wanted => $get_set_defs_wanted, follow_fast=>1, no_chdir=>1}, $topdir);
00173     map { $_ =~ s|^$topdir/?|| } @found_set_defs;
00174     return @found_set_defs;
00175 }

00177 ## Try to make reading of set defs more flexible.  Additional strategies
00178 ## for fixing a path can be added here.
00179 
00180 sub munge_pg_file_path {
00181     my $self = shift;
00182     my $pg_path = shift;
00183     my $path_to_set_def = shift;
00184     my $end_path = $pg_path;
00185     # if the path is ok, don't fix it
00186     return($pg_path) if(-e $self->r->ce->{courseDirs}{templates}."/$pg_path");
00187     # if we have followed a link into a self contained course to get
00188     # to the set.def file, we need to insert the start of the path to
00189     # the set.def file
00190     $end_path = "$path_to_set_def/$pg_path";
00191     return($end_path) if(-e $self->r->ce->{courseDirs}{templates}."/$end_path");
00192     # if we got this far, this path is bad, but we let it produce
00193     # an error so the user knows there is a troublesome path in the
00194     # set.def file.
00195     return($pg_path);
00196 }
00197 
00198 ## Read a set definition file.  This could be abstracted since it happens
00199 ## elsewhere.  Here we don't have to process so much of the file.
00200 
00201 sub read_set_def {
00202     my $self = shift;
00203     my $r = $self->r;
00204     my $filePathOrig = shift;
00205     my $filePath = $r->ce->{courseDirs}{templates}."/$filePathOrig";
00206     $filePathOrig =~ s/set.*\.def$//;
00207     $filePathOrig =~ s|/$||;
00208     $filePathOrig = "." if ($filePathOrig !~ /\S/);
00209     my @pg_files = ();
00210     my ($line, $got_to_pgs, $name, @rest) = ("", 0, "");
00211     if ( open (SETFILENAME, "$filePath") )    {
00212         while($line = <SETFILENAME>) {
00213             chomp($line);
00214             $line =~ s|(#.*)||; # don't read past comments
00215             if($got_to_pgs) {
00216                 unless ($line =~ /\S/) {next;} # skip blank lines
00217                 ($name,@rest) = split (/\s*,\s*/,$line);
00218                 $name =~ s/\s*//g;
00219                 push @pg_files, $name;
00220             } else {
00221                 $got_to_pgs = 1 if ($line =~ /problemList\s*=/);
00222             }
00223         }
00224     } else {
00225         $self->addbadmessage("Cannot open $filePath");
00226     }
00227     # This is where we would potentially munge the pg file paths
00228     # One possibility
00229     @pg_files = map { $self->munge_pg_file_path($_, $filePathOrig) } @pg_files;
00230     return(@pg_files);
00231 }

00233 ## go through past page getting a list of identifiers for the problems
00234 ## and whether or not they are selected, and whether or not they should
00235 ## be hidden
00236 
00237 sub get_past_problem_files {
00238     my $r = shift;
00239     my @found=();
00240     my $count =1;
00241     while (defined($r->param("filetrial$count"))) {
00242         my $val = 0;
00243         $val |= ADDED if($r->param("trial$count"));
00244         $val |= HIDDEN if($r->param("hideme$count"));
00245         $val |= MOVED if($r->param("moved$count"));
00246         push @found, [$r->param("filetrial$count"), $val];          
00247         $count++;
00248     }
00249     $count = 1;
00250     while (defined($r->param("mysetfiletrial$count"))) {
00251       my $val = 0;
00252       $val |= DELETED if($r->param("deleted$count"));
00253       push @found, [$r->param("mysetfiletrial$count"), $val];
00254       $count++;
00255     }
00256     return(\@found);
00257 }

00259 #### For adding new problems
00260 
00261 sub add_selected {
00262     my $self = shift;
00263     my $db = shift;
00264     my $setName = shift;
00265     my @past_problems = @{$self->{past_problems}};
00266     my @selected = @past_problems;
00267     my (@path, $file, $selected, $freeProblemID);
00268     # DBFIXME count would work just as well
00269     $freeProblemID = max($db->listGlobalProblems($setName)) + 1;
00270     my $addedcount=0;
00271 
00272     for $selected (@selected) {
00273         if($selected->[1] & ADDED || $selected->[1] & MOVED) {
00274             $file = $selected->[0];
00275             #print "$file";
00276             my $problemRecord = $self->addProblemToSet(setName => $setName,
00277                 sourceFile => $file, problemID => $freeProblemID);
00278             $freeProblemID++;
00279             $self->assignProblemToAllSetUsers($problemRecord);
00280             if(!($selected->[1] & MOVED)){
00281               $selected->[1] |= SUCCESS;
00282             }
00283             $addedcount++;
00284         }
00285     }
00286     return($addedcount);
00287 }
00288 
00289 sub delete_selected {
00290     my $self = shift;
00291     my $db = shift;
00292     my $setName = shift;
00293     my @past_problems = @{$self->{past_problems}};
00294     my @selected = @past_problems;
00295     my (@path, $file, $selected);
00296     # DBFIXME count would work just as well
00297     my $deletedcount=0;
00298 
00299     for $selected (@selected) {
00300         if($selected->[1] & DELETED || $selected->[1] & MOVED) {
00301           foreach my $problem ($db->listGlobalProblems($setName)) {
00302               my $problemRecord = $db->getGlobalProblem($setName, $problem);
00303               if($problemRecord->source_file eq $selected->[0]){
00304                 $db->deleteGlobalProblem($setName, $problemRecord->problem_id);
00305               }
00306           }
00307           if(!($selected->[1] & MOVED)){
00308               $selected->[1] |= SUCCESS;
00309             }
00310             $deletedcount++;
00311         }
00312     }
00313     return($deletedcount);
00314 }

00316 ##order the problems as they are after user reorder
00317 sub reorderProblems {
00318   my $self = shift;
00319     my $db = shift;
00320     my $setID = shift;
00321     my $r = shift;
00322     #my (@problemIDList) = @_;
00323     #my ($prob1, $prob2, $prob);
00324     my $index = 1;
00325     #get all the problems
00326     my @problems = ();
00327     while (defined($r->param("reorder$index"))) {
00328       #this will work if i can get problems by name
00329         my $problemRecord; # checked
00330         foreach my $problem ($db->listGlobalProblems($setID)) {
00331             my $tempProblem = $db->getGlobalProblem($setID, $problem);
00332           if($tempProblem->source_file eq $r->param("reorder$index")){
00333             $problemRecord = $tempProblem;
00334           }
00335         }
00336         die "global " .$r->param("reorder$index") ." for set $setID not found." unless $problemRecord;
00337         #print "found this problem to be reordered: ".$problemRecord."\n";
00338         push @problems, $problemRecord;
00339       $index = $index + 1;
00340     }
00341     #then change their info
00342     my @setUsers = $db->listSetUsers($setID);
00343     my $user;
00344     $index = 1;
00345     foreach my $problem (@problems) {
00346       $problem->problem_id($index);
00347       die "global $problem not found." unless $problem;
00348       #print "problem to be reordered: ".$problem."\n";
00349       $db->putGlobalProblem($problem);
00350       
00351       #need to deal with users?
00352       foreach $user (@setUsers) {
00353         my $prob1 = $db->getUserProblem($user, $setID, $index); #checked
00354           die " problem $index for set $setID and effective user $user not found"   unless $prob1;
00355       $prob1->problem_id($index);
00356         $db->putUserProblem($prob1);
00357       }
00358       $index = $index + 1;
00359     }
00360 }

00362 ############# List of sets of problems in templates directory
00363 
00364 sub get_problem_directories {
00365     my $ce = shift;
00366     my $lib = shift;
00367     my $source = $ce->{courseDirs}{templates};
00368     my $main = MY_PROBLEMS; my $isTop = 1;
00369     if ($lib) {$source .= "/$lib"; $main = MAIN_PROBLEMS; $isTop = 2}
00370     my @all_problem_directories = get_library_sets($isTop, $source);
00371     my $includetop = shift @all_problem_directories;
00372     my $j;
00373     for ($j=0; $j<scalar(@all_problem_directories); $j++) {
00374         $all_problem_directories[$j] =~ s|^$ce->{courseDirs}->{templates}/?||;
00375     }
00376     @all_problem_directories = sortByName(undef, @all_problem_directories);
00377     unshift @all_problem_directories, $main if($includetop);
00378     return (\@all_problem_directories);
00379 }

00381 ############# Everyone has a view problems line.    Abstract it
00382 sub view_problems_line {
00383     my $internal_name = shift;
00384     my $label = shift;
00385     my $r = shift; # so we can get parameter values
00386     my $self = shift;
00387     my $urlpath = $r->urlpath;
00388   my $getProblemPath = $self->systemLink($urlpath->newFromModule("WeBWorK::ContentGenerator::Instructor::GetLibrarySetProblems", $r, courseID =>$urlpath->arg("courseID")));
00389     my $result = "<span><button type='button' onclick='viewProblems(\"$internal_name\" ,\"mainform\", \"".$r->uri."\", \"view_problems_spinner\");'>$label</button><img id='view_problems_spinner' style='display:none;' src='/webwork2_files/images/ajax-loader-small.gif'></img></span>";
00390     #$result .= CGI::hidden(-name=>"$internal_name");
00391     my %display_modes = %{WeBWorK::PG::DISPLAY_MODES()};
00392     my @active_modes = grep { exists $display_modes{$_} }
00393         @{$r->ce->{pg}->{displayModes}};
00394     push @active_modes, 'None';
00395     # We have our own displayMode since its value may be None, which is illegal
00396     # in other modules.
00397     my $mydisplayMode = $r->param('mydisplayMode') || $r->ce->{pg}->{options}->{displayMode};
00398     $result .= '&nbsp;Display&nbsp;Mode:&nbsp;'.CGI::popup_menu(-name=> 'mydisplayMode',
00399                                                                 -values=>\@active_modes,
00400                                                                 -default=> $mydisplayMode);
00401     # Now we give a choice of the number of problems to show
00402     my $defaultMax = $r->param('max_shown') || MAX_SHOW_DEFAULT;
00403     $result .= '&nbsp;Max. Shown:&nbsp'.
00404         CGI::popup_menu(-name=> 'max_shown',
00405                         -values=>[5,10,15,20,25,30,50,'All'],
00406                         -default=> $defaultMax);
00407     # Option of whether to show hints and solutions
00408     my $defaultHints = $r->param('showHints') || SHOW_HINTS_DEFAULT;
00409     $result .= "&nbsp;".CGI::checkbox(-name=>"showHints",-checked=>$defaultHints,-label=>"Hints");
00410     my $defaultSolutions = $r->param('showSolutions') || SHOW_SOLUTIONS_DEFAULT;
00411     $result .= "&nbsp;".CGI::checkbox(-name=>"showSolutions",-checked=>$defaultSolutions,-label=>"Solutions");
00412     
00413     return($result);
00414 }

00417 ### The browsing panel has three versions
00418 #####    Version 1 is local problems
00419 sub browse_local_panel {
00420     my $self = shift;
00421     my $library_selected = shift;
00422     my $lib = shift || ''; $lib =~ s/^browse_//;
00423     my $name = ($lib eq '')? 'Local' : $problib{$lib};
00424     
00425     my $list_of_prob_dirs= get_problem_directories($self->r->ce,$lib);
00426     if(scalar(@$list_of_prob_dirs) == 0) {
00427         $library_selected = "Found no directories containing problems";
00428         unshift @{$list_of_prob_dirs}, $library_selected;
00429     } else {
00430         my $default_value = SELECT_LOCAL_STRING;
00431         if (not $library_selected or $library_selected eq $default_value) {
00432             unshift @{$list_of_prob_dirs},  $default_value;
00433             $library_selected = $default_value;
00434         }
00435     }
00436     debug("library is $lib and sets are $library_selected");
00437     my $view_problem_line = view_problems_line('view_local_set', 'View Problems', $self->r, $self);
00438     my @popup_menu_args = (
00439       -size => 4,
00440         -name => 'library_sets',
00441         -values => $list_of_prob_dirs,
00442         -default => $library_selected,
00443     );
00444     # make labels without the $lib prefix -- reduces the width of the popup menu
00445     if (length($lib)) {
00446         my %labels = map { my($l)=$_=~/^$lib\/(.*)$/;$_=>$l } @$list_of_prob_dirs;
00447         push @popup_menu_args, -labels => \%labels;
00448     }
00449     print CGI::div({-class=>"InfoPanel", -align=>"left"}, "<p style='margin-bottom:0'>$name Problems: </p>",
00450                       CGI::popup_menu(@popup_menu_args),
00451                       CGI::br(), 
00452                       $view_problem_line,
00453     );
00454 }

00496 #####    Version 2.1 is local homework sets
00497 sub edit_mysets_panel {
00498     my $self = shift;
00499     my $library_selected = shift;
00500     my $list_of_local_sets = shift;
00501     my $default_value = "Select a Homework Set";
00502 
00503     if(scalar(@$list_of_local_sets) == 0) {
00504         $list_of_local_sets = [NO_LOCAL_SET_STRING];
00505     } elsif (not $library_selected or $library_selected eq $default_value) { 
00506         unshift @{$list_of_local_sets},  $default_value; 
00507         $library_selected = $default_value; 
00508     } 
00509 
00510     my $view_problem_line = view_problems_line('edit_mysets_set', 'View Problems', $self->r, $self);
00511     print CGI::Tr({},
00512         CGI::td({-class=>"InfoPanel", -align=>"left"}, "<p style='margin-bottom:0;'>Browse from:</p>",
00513         CGI::popup_menu(-name=> 'library_sets', 
00514                         -size=> 4,
00515                         -values=>$list_of_local_sets, 
00516                         -default=> $library_selected),
00517         CGI::br(), 
00518         $view_problem_line
00519     ));
00520 }
00521 
00522 #####    Version 3 is the problem library
00523 # 
00524 # This comes in 3 forms, problem library version 1, and for version 2 there
00525 # is the basic, and the advanced interfaces.  This function checks what we are
00526 # supposed to do, or aborts if the problem library has not been installed.
00527 
00528 sub browse_library_panel {
00529     my $self=shift;
00530     my $r = $self->r;
00531     my $ce = $r->ce;
00532 
00533     # See if the problem library is installed
00534     my $libraryRoot = $r->{ce}->{problemLibrary}->{root};
00535 
00536     unless($libraryRoot) {
00537         print CGI::div({class=>'ResultsWithError', align=>"center"}, 
00538             "The problem library has not been installed.");
00539         return;
00540     }
00541     # Test if the Library directory link exists.  If not, try to make it
00542     unless(-d "$ce->{courseDirs}->{templates}/Library") {
00543         unless(symlink($libraryRoot, "$ce->{courseDirs}->{templates}/Library")) {
00544             my $msg =    <<"HERE";
00545 You are missing the directory <code>templates/Library</code>, which is needed
00546 for the Problem Library to function.    It should be a link pointing to
00547 <code>$libraryRoot</code>, which you set in <code>conf/global.conf</code>.
00548 I tried to make the link for you, but that failed.  Check the permissions
00549 in your <code>templates</code> directory.
00550 HERE
00551             $self->addbadmessage($msg);
00552         }
00553     }
00554 
00555     # Now check what version we are supposed to use
00556     my $libraryVersion = $r->{ce}->{problemLibrary}->{version} || 1;
00557     if($libraryVersion == 1) {
00558         return $self->browse_library_panel1;
00559     } elsif($libraryVersion == 2) {
00560         return $self->browse_library_panel2 if($self->{library_basic}==1);
00561         return $self->browse_library_panel2adv;
00562     } else {
00563         print CGI::div({class=>'ResultsWithError', align=>"center"}, 
00564             "The problem library version is set to an illegal value.");
00565         return;
00566     }
00567 }
00568 
00569 sub browse_library_panel1 {
00570     my $self = shift;
00571     my $r = $self->r;
00572     my $ce = $r->ce;
00573     
00574     my @chaps = WeBWorK::Utils::ListingDB::getAllChapters($r->{ce});
00575     unshift @chaps, LIB2_DATA->{dbchapter}{all};
00576     my $chapter_selected = $r->param('library_chapters') || LIB2_DATA->{dbchapter}->{all};
00577 
00578     my @sects=();
00579     if ($chapter_selected ne LIB2_DATA->{dbchapter}{all}) {
00580         @sects = WeBWorK::Utils::ListingDB::getAllSections($r->{ce}, $chapter_selected);
00581     }
00582 
00583     unshift @sects, ALL_SECTIONS;
00584     my $section_selected =  $r->param('library_sections') || LIB2_DATA->{dbsection}{all};
00585 
00586     my $view_problem_line = view_problems_line('lib_view', 'View Problems', $self->r, $self);
00587 
00588     print CGI::div({-class=>"InfoPanel", -align=>"left"},
00589                 CGI::div(["Chapter:",
00590                     CGI::popup_menu(-name=> 'library_chapters', 
00591                                     -size=>4,
00592                                     -values=>\@chaps,
00593                                     -default=> $chapter_selected,
00594                                     -onchange=>"updateLibCategories(\'mainform\', \'".$r->uri."\', \'null\',\'view_problems_spinner\')"
00595                     ),
00596                     CGI::submit(-name=>"lib_select_chapter", -value=>"Update Section List")]),
00597                 CGI::div("Section:", 
00598                     CGI::popup_menu(-name=> 'library_sections', 
00599                                     -values=>\@sects,
00600                                     -default=> $section_selected
00601             )),
00602             CGI::div($view_problem_line)
00603         );
00604 }

00606 sub browse_library_panel2 {

00616

00642         )),
00643         CGI::div({-style=>"float:left;"},"<p style='margin-bottom:0'>Chapter:</p>",
00644           CGI::popup_menu(-name=> 'library_chapters', 
00645                           -size=>4,
00646                                 -values=>\@chaps,
00647                                 -default=> $chapter_selected,
00648                                  -onchange=>"updateLibCategories(\'mainform\', \'".$r->uri."\', \'null\',\'view_problems_spinner\')"
00649         )),
00650       CGI::div({-style=>"float:left;"},"<p style='margin-bottom:0'>Section:</p>",
00651             CGI::popup_menu(-name=> 'library_sections', 
00652                         -size=>4,
00653                             -values=>\@sects,
00654                             -default=> $section_selected,
00655                             -onchange=>"updateLibCategories(\'mainform\', \'".$r->uri."\', \'null\',\'view_problems_spinner\')"
00656         )),
00657         '<div colspan=2 align="right">',
00658           '<button type="button" onclick="updateLibCategories(\'mainform\', \''.$r->uri.'\', \'library_advanced\', \'view_problems_spinner\')">Advanced Search</button>',
00659         '</div>',

00661           '<button type="button" onclick="updateLibCategories(\'mainform\', \''.$r->uri.'\', \'lib_select_subject\', \'view_problems_spinner\')">Update Chapter/Section Lists</button>',
00662         '</div>',
00663         #CGI::div({-colspan=>2, -align=>"right"},
00664         #  CGI::submit(-name=>"library_advanced", -value=>"Advanced Search")),
00665         #CGI::div({-colspan=>2, -align=>"right"},
00666         #  CGI::submit(-name=>"lib_select_subject", -value=>"Update Chapter/Section Lists")),

00674 sub browse_library_panel2adv {
00675     my $self = shift;
00676     my $r = $self->r;
00677     my $ce = $r->ce;
00678     my $right_button_style = "width: 18ex";
00679 
00680     my @subjs = WeBWorK::Utils::ListingDB::getAllDBsubjects($r);
00681     if(! grep { $_ eq $r->param('library_subjects') } @subjs) {
00682         $r->param('library_subjects', '');
00683     }
00684     unshift @subjs, LIB2_DATA->{dbsubject}{all};
00685 
00686     my @chaps = WeBWorK::Utils::ListingDB::getAllDBchapters($r);
00687     if(! grep { $_ eq $r->param('library_chapters') } @chaps) {
00688         $r->param('library_chapters', '');
00689     }
00690     unshift @chaps, LIB2_DATA->{dbchapter}{all};
00691 
00692     my @sects = WeBWorK::Utils::ListingDB::getAllDBsections($r);
00693     if(! grep { $_ eq $r->param('library_sections') } @sects) {
00694         $r->param('library_sections', '');
00695     }
00696     unshift @sects, LIB2_DATA->{dbsection}{all};
00697 
00698     my $texts = WeBWorK::Utils::ListingDB::getDBTextbooks($r);
00699     my @textarray = map { $_->[0] }  @{$texts};
00700     my %textlabels = ();
00701     for my $ta (@{$texts}) {
00702         $textlabels{$ta->[0]} = $ta->[1]." by ".$ta->[2]." (edition ".$ta->[3].")";
00703     }
00704     if(! grep { $_ eq $r->param('library_textbook') } @textarray) {
00705         $r->param('library_textbook', '');
00706     }
00707     unshift @textarray, LIB2_DATA->{textbook}{all};
00708     my $atb = LIB2_DATA->{textbook}{all}; $textlabels{$atb} = LIB2_DATA->{textbook}{all};
00709 
00710     my $textchap_ref = WeBWorK::Utils::ListingDB::getDBTextbooks($r, 'textchapter');
00711     my @textchaps = map { $_->[0] } @{$textchap_ref};
00712     if(! grep { $_ eq $r->param('library_textchapter') } @textchaps) {
00713         $r->param('library_textchapter', '');
00714     }
00715     unshift @textchaps, LIB2_DATA->{textchapter}{all};
00716 
00717     my $textsec_ref = WeBWorK::Utils::ListingDB::getDBTextbooks($r, 'textsection');
00718     my @textsecs = map { $_->[0] } @{$textsec_ref};
00719     if(! grep { $_ eq $r->param('library_textsection') } @textsecs) {
00720         $r->param('library_textsection', '');
00721     }
00722     unshift @textsecs, LIB2_DATA->{textsection}{all};
00723 
00724     my %selected = ();
00725     for my $j (qw( dbsection dbchapter dbsubject textbook textchapter textsection )) {
00726         $selected{$j} = $r->param(LIB2_DATA->{$j}{name}) || LIB2_DATA->{$j}{all};
00727     }
00728 
00729     my $text_popup = CGI::popup_menu(-name => 'library_textbook',
00730                      -size => 4,
00731                                      -values =>\@textarray,
00732                                      -labels => \%textlabels,
00733                                      -default=>$selected{textbook},
00734                                      -onchange=>"updateLibCategories(\'mainform\', \'".$r->uri."\', \'null\',\'view_problems_spinner\')");
00735 
00736     
00737     my $library_keywords = $r->param('library_keywords') || '';
00738 
00739     my $view_problem_line = view_problems_line('lib_view', 'View Problems', $self->r, $self);
00740 
00741     my $count_line = WeBWorK::Utils::ListingDB::countDBListings($r);
00742     if($count_line==0) {
00743         $count_line = "There are no matching pg files";
00744     } else {
00745         $count_line = "There are $count_line matching WeBWorK problem files";
00746     }
00747 
00748     print CGI::div({-class=>"InfoPanel", -align=>"left"},
00749         CGI::hidden(-name=>"library_is_basic", -default=>2,-override=>1),
00750         # Html done by hand since it is temporary
00751         CGI::div({-colspan=>4, -align=>"center"}, 'All Selected Constraints Joined by "And"'),
00752             CGI::div(["Subject:",
00753                 CGI::popup_menu(-name=> 'library_subjects', 
00754                               -size => 4,
00755                                 -values=>\@subjs,
00756                                 -default=> $selected{dbsubject},
00757                                  -onchange=>"updateLibCategories(\'mainform\', \'".$r->uri."\',\'view_problems_spinner\')"
00758                 )]),
00759             CGI::div({-colspan=>2, -align=>"right"},
00760                 '<button type="button" style="'.$right_button_style.'" onclick="updateLibCategories(\'mainform\', \''.$r->uri.'\', \'lib_select_subject\', \'null\',\'view_problems_spinner\')">Update Menus</button>'),
00761             CGI::div(["Chapter:",
00762                 CGI::popup_menu(-name=> 'library_chapters', 
00763                               -size => 4,
00764                                 -values=>\@chaps,
00765                                 -default=> $selected{dbchapter},
00766                                  -onchange=>"updateLibCategories(\'mainform\', \'".$r->uri."\',\'view_problems_spinner\')"
00767             )]),
00768             CGI::div({-colspan=>2, -align=>"right"},
00769                     '<button type="button" style="'.$right_button_style.'" onclick="updateLibCategories(\'mainform\', \''.$r->uri.'\', \'library_reset\', \'null\',\'view_problems_spinner\')">Reset</button>'),
00770             CGI::div(["Section:",
00771             CGI::popup_menu(-name=> 'library_sections', 
00772                         -size => 4,
00773                             -values=>\@sects,
00774                             -default=> $selected{dbsection},
00775                             -onchange=>"updateLibCategories(\'mainform\', \'".$r->uri."\',\'null\',\'view_problems_spinner\')"
00776             )]),
00777             CGI::div({-colspan=>2, -align=>"right"},
00778                     '<button type="button" style="'.$right_button_style.'" onclick="updateLibCategories(\'mainform\', \''.$r->uri.'\', \'library_basic\', \'null\',\'view_problems_spinner\')">Basic Search</button>'),
00779             CGI::div(["Textbook:", $text_popup]),
00780             CGI::div(["Text chapter:",
00781             CGI::popup_menu(-name=> 'library_textchapter', 
00782                         -size => 4,
00783                             -values=>\@textchaps,
00784                             -default=> $selected{textchapter},
00785                             -onchange=>"updateLibCategories(\'mainform\', \'".$r->uri."\',\'null\',\'view_problems_spinner\')"
00786             )]),
00787             CGI::div(["Text section:",
00788             CGI::popup_menu(-name=> 'library_textsection', 
00789                         -size => 4,
00790                             -values=>\@textsecs,
00791                             -default=> $selected{textsection},
00792                             -onchange=>"updateLibCategories(\'mainform\', \'".$r->uri."\',\'null\',\'view_problems_spinner\')"
00793             )]),
00794              CGI::div("Keywords:"),CGI::div({-colspan=>2},
00795              CGI::textfield(-name=>"library_keywords",
00796                             -default=>$library_keywords,
00797                             -override=>1,
00798                             -size=>40)),
00799       CGI::div({-colspan=>3}, $view_problem_line),
00800       CGI::div({-colspan=>3, -align=>"center"}, $count_line)
00801      );
00802     
00803 }

00806 #####    Version 4 is the set definition file panel
00807 
00808 sub browse_setdef_panel {
00809     my $self = shift;
00810     my $r = $self->r;
00811     my $ce = $r->ce;
00812     my $library_selected = shift;
00813     my $default_value = "Select a Set Definition File";
00814     # in the following line, the parens after sort are important. if they are
00815     # omitted, sort will interpret get_set_defs as the name of the comparison
00816     # function, and ($ce->{courseDirs}{templates}) as a single element list to
00817     # be sorted. *barf*
00818     my @list_of_set_defs = sort(get_set_defs($ce->{courseDirs}{templates}));
00819     if(scalar(@list_of_set_defs) == 0) {
00820         @list_of_set_defs = (NO_LOCAL_SET_STRING);
00821     } elsif (not $library_selected or $library_selected eq $default_value) { 
00822         unshift @list_of_set_defs, $default_value; 
00823         $library_selected = $default_value; 
00824     }
00825     my $view_problem_line = view_problems_line('view_setdef_set', 'View Problems', $self->r, $self);
00826     my $popupetc = CGI::popup_menu(-size=> 4,
00827                                   -name=> 'library_sets',
00828                                 -values=>\@list_of_set_defs,
00829                                 -default=> $library_selected).
00830         CGI::br().  $view_problem_line;
00831     if($list_of_set_defs[0] eq NO_LOCAL_SET_STRING) {
00832         $popupetc = "there are no set definition files in this course to look at."
00833     }
00834     print CGI::div({-class=>"InfoPanel", -align=>"left"}, "<p style='margin-bottom:0;'>Browse from:</p>",
00835         $popupetc
00836     );
00837 }

00965       #);
00966       
00967     print "<div class='inforPanel' style='float:left;'>
00968     <p style='margin-bottom:0'>Browse:</p>
00969     <select id='library_selector' size=4 onchange='changeLibrary(\"mainform\", \"".$r->uri."\", this, \"view_problems_spinner\")'>"
00970     ;
00971     print "<option value=\'browse_npl_library\'>National Problem Library</option>
00972             <option value=\'browse_local\'>Local Problems</option>
00973             <option value=\'edit_mysets\'>From this Course</option>
00974             <option value=\'browse_setdefs\'>Set Definition Files</option>"
00975     ;
00976     foreach my $lib (sort(keys(%problib))) {
00977       print "<option value=\'browse_$lib\'>".$problib{$lib}."</option>"
00978     }
00979     
00980     print "</select>
00981       </div>"
00982     ;
00983       
00984 }
00985 
00986 sub make_data_row {
00987     my $self = shift;
00988     my $r = $self->r;
00989     my $sourceFileName = shift;
00990     my $pg = shift;
00991     my $cnt = shift;
00992     my $mark = shift || 0;
00993 
00994     $sourceFileName =~ s|^./||; # clean up top ugliness
00995 
00996     my $urlpath = $self->r->urlpath;
00997     my $db = $self->r->db;
00998 
00999     ## to set up edit and try links elegantly we want to know if
01000     ##    any target set is a gateway assignment or not
01001     my $localSet = $self->r->param('local_sets');
01002     my $setRecord;
01003     if ( defined($localSet) && $localSet ne SELECT_SET_STRING &&
01004          $localSet ne NO_LOCAL_SET_STRING ) {
01005         $setRecord = $db->getGlobalSet( $localSet );
01006     }
01007     my $isGatewaySet = ( defined($setRecord) && 
01008                  $setRecord->assignment_type =~ /gateway/ );
01009 
01010     my $problem_output = $pg->{flags}->{error_flag} ?
01011         CGI::div({class=>"ResultsWithError"}, CGI::em("This problem produced an error"))
01012         : CGI::div({class=>"RenderSolo"}, $pg->{body_text});
01013     $problem_output .= $pg->{flags}->{comment} if($pg->{flags}->{comment});
01014 
01015 
01016     #if($self->{r}->param('browse_which') ne 'browse_npl_library') {
01017     my $problem_seed = $self->{'problem_seed'} || 1234;
01018     my $edit_link = CGI::a({href=>$self->systemLink(
01019          $urlpath->newFromModule("WeBWorK::ContentGenerator::Instructor::PGProblemEditor", $r,
01020               courseID =>$urlpath->arg("courseID"),
01021               setID=>"Undefined_Set",
01022               problemID=>"1"),
01023             params=>{sourceFilePath => "$sourceFileName", problemSeed=> $problem_seed}
01024           ), target=>"WW_Editor"}, "Edit it" );
01025     
01026     my $displayMode = $self->r->param("mydisplayMode");
01027     $displayMode = $self->r->ce->{pg}->{options}->{displayMode}
01028         if not defined $displayMode or $displayMode eq "None";
01029     my $module = ( $isGatewaySet ) ? "GatewayQuiz" : "Problem";
01030     my %pathArgs = ( courseID =>$urlpath->arg("courseID"),
01031             setID=>"Undefined_Set" );
01032     $pathArgs{problemID} = "1" if ( ! $isGatewaySet );
01033 
01034     my $try_link = CGI::a({href=>$self->systemLink(
01035         $urlpath->newFromModule("WeBWorK::ContentGenerator::$module", $r,
01036             %pathArgs ),
01037             params =>{
01038                 effectiveUser => scalar($self->r->param('user')),
01039                 editMode => "SetMaker",
01040                 problemSeed=> $problem_seed,
01041                 sourceFilePath => "$sourceFileName",
01042                 displayMode => $displayMode,
01043             }
01044         ), target=>"WW_View"}, "Try it");
01045 
01046     my %add_box_data = ( -id=>"trial$cnt", -class=>"add_problem_checkbox" ,-name=>"trial$cnt",-value=>1,-label=>"Add this problem to the target set on the next update");
01047     #allow for a move command from one problem set to anoter
01048     my $move_box_data;
01049     if($self->r->param('edit_mysets_set')){
01050       $move_box_data = CGI::checkbox( -id=>"moved$cnt" ,-name=>"moved$cnt",-value=>1,,-override=>1,-label=>"Move this problem from this set to the target set on the next update");
01051     }
01052     else{
01053       $move_box_data = "";
01054     }
01055     if($mark & SUCCESS) {
01056         $add_box_data{ -label } .= " (just added this problem)";
01057     } elsif($mark & ADDED) {
01058         $add_box_data{ -checked } = 1;
01059     }
01060 
01061     if(!($self->{isInSet}{$sourceFileName})){
01062 
01063     print CGI::div({-class=>"problem libraryProblem", -align=>"left", -draggable=>"true", -href=>"#", -id=>"$cnt"},
01064         CGI::p(CGI::span({style=> 'float:left'},"File name: $sourceFileName "), 
01065                CGI::span({style=>'float:right'}, $edit_link, "&nbsp;&nbsp;", $try_link,"&nbsp;")
01066         ),CGI::br(),
01067         CGI::checkbox(-id=>"hideme$cnt", -name=>"hideme$cnt",-value=>1,-label=>"Don't show this problem on the next update",-override=>1),
01068         CGI::br(),CGI::checkbox((%add_box_data),-override=>1),
01069         CGI::p($move_box_data),
01070         CGI::hidden(-id=>"filetrial$cnt", -name=>"filetrial$cnt", -default=>$sourceFileName,-override=>1).
01071         CGI::p($problem_output)
01072       );
01073     }
01074     else{
01075       print CGI::div({-class=>"problem libraryProblem used", -align=>"left", -draggable=>"true", -href=>"#", -id=>"$cnt"},
01076         CGI::p({},"File name: $sourceFileName "), 
01077         CGI::p({}, $edit_link, " ", $try_link),
01078         CGI::p(CGI::checkbox(-id=>"hideme$cnt", -name=>"hideme$cnt",-value=>1,-label=>"Don't show this problem on the next update",-override=>1)),
01079         CGI::p(CGI::checkbox((%add_box_data),-override=>1)),
01080         CGI::p($move_box_data),
01081         CGI::hidden(-id=>"filetrial$cnt", -name=>"filetrial$cnt", -default=>$sourceFileName,-override=>1).
01082         CGI::p($problem_output),
01083         CGI::b("(This problem is in the target set)")
01084       );
01085     }
01086 }
01087 
01088 sub make_myset_data_row {
01089     my $self = shift;
01090     my $r = $self->r;
01091     my $sourceFileName = shift;
01092     my $pg = shift;
01093     my $cnt = shift;
01094     my $mark = shift || 0;
01095 
01096     $sourceFileName =~ s|^./||; # clean up top ugliness
01097 
01098     my $urlpath = $self->r->urlpath;
01099     my $db = $self->r->db;
01100 
01101     ## to set up edit and try links elegantly we want to know if
01102     ##    any target set is a gateway assignment or not
01103     my $localSet = $self->r->param('local_sets');
01104     my $setRecord;
01105     if ( defined($localSet) && $localSet ne SELECT_SET_STRING &&
01106          $localSet ne NO_LOCAL_SET_STRING ) {
01107         $setRecord = $db->getGlobalSet( $localSet );
01108     }
01109     my $isGatewaySet = ( defined($setRecord) && 
01110                  $setRecord->assignment_type =~ /gateway/ );
01111 
01112     my $problem_output = $pg->{flags}->{error_flag} ?
01113         CGI::div({class=>"ResultsWithError"}, CGI::em("This problem produced an error"))
01114         : CGI::div({class=>"RenderSolo"}, $pg->{body_text});
01115     $problem_output .= $pg->{flags}->{comment} if($pg->{flags}->{comment});
01116 
01117 
01118     #if($self->{r}->param('browse_which') ne 'browse_npl_library') {
01119     my $problem_seed = $self->{'problem_seed'} || 1234;
01120     my $edit_link = CGI::a({href=>$self->systemLink(
01121          $urlpath->newFromModule("WeBWorK::ContentGenerator::Instructor::PGProblemEditor", $r,
01122               courseID =>$urlpath->arg("courseID"),
01123               setID=>"Undefined_Set",
01124               problemID=>"1"),
01125             params=>{sourceFilePath => "$sourceFileName", problemSeed=> $problem_seed}
01126           ), target=>"WW_Editor"}, "Edit it" );
01127     
01128     my %delete_box_data = ( -id=>"deleted$cnt".'myset' ,-name=>"deleted$cnt",-value=>1,-label=>"Delete this problem from the target set on the next update");
01129     
01130     my $displayMode = $self->r->param("mydisplayMode");
01131     $displayMode = $self->r->ce->{pg}->{options}->{displayMode}
01132         if not defined $displayMode or $displayMode eq "None";
01133     my $module = ( $isGatewaySet ) ? "GatewayQuiz" : "Problem";
01134     my %pathArgs = ( courseID =>$urlpath->arg("courseID"),
01135             setID=>"Undefined_Set" );
01136     $pathArgs{problemID} = "1" if ( ! $isGatewaySet );
01137 
01138     my $try_link = CGI::a({href=>$self->systemLink(
01139         $urlpath->newFromModule("WeBWorK::ContentGenerator::$module", $r,
01140             %pathArgs ),
01141             params =>{
01142                 effectiveUser => scalar($self->r->param('user')),
01143                 editMode => "SetMaker",
01144                 problemSeed=> $problem_seed,
01145                 sourceFilePath => "$sourceFileName",
01146                 displayMode => $displayMode,
01147             }
01148         ), target=>"WW_View"}, "Try it");
01149 
01150     print CGI::div({-class=>"problem myProblem", -draggable=>"true", -href=>"#", -id=>("$cnt".'myset')},
01151         CGI::p({},"File name: $sourceFileName "), 
01152     CGI::p({}, $edit_link, " ", $try_link),
01153         CGI::p(CGI::checkbox((%delete_box_data),-override=>1)),
01154         CGI::hidden(-id=>"filetrial$cnt".'myset', -name=>"mysetfiletrial$cnt", -default=>$sourceFileName,-override=>1),
01155         CGI::p($problem_output),
01156     );
01157 }
01158 
01159 sub clear_default {
01160     my $r = shift;
01161     my $param = shift;
01162     my $default = shift;
01163     my $newvalue = $r->param($param) || '';
01164     $newvalue = '' if($newvalue eq $default);
01165     $r->param($param, $newvalue);
01166 }
01167 
01168 sub pre_header_initialize {
01169     my ($self) = @_;
01170     my $r = $self->r;
01171     ## For all cases, lets set some things
01172     $self->{error}=0;
01173     my $ce = $r->ce;
01174     my $db = $r->db;
01175     my $maxShown = $r->param('max_shown') || MAX_SHOW_DEFAULT;
01176     $maxShown = 10000000 if($maxShown eq 'All'); # let's hope there aren't more
01177     my $library_basic = $r->param('library_is_basic') || 1;
01178     $self->{problem_seed} = $r->param('problem_seed') || 1234;
01179     ## Fix some parameters
01180     for my $key (keys(%{ LIB2_DATA() })) {
01181         clear_default($r, LIB2_DATA->{$key}->{name}, LIB2_DATA->{$key}->{all} );
01182     }
01183     ##  Grab library sets to display from parameters list.  We will modify this
01184     ##  as we go through the if/else tree
01185     $self->{current_library_set} =  $r->param('library_sets');
01186     $self->{current_myset_set} = $r->param('myset_sets');
01187     if (not defined($self->{current_myset_set}) 
01188         or $self->{current_myset_set} eq "Select a Homework Set"
01189         or $self->{current_myset_set} eq NO_LOCAL_SET_STRING) {
01190       my @all_db_sets = $db->listGlobalSets;
01191         @all_db_sets = sortByName(undef, @all_db_sets);
01192         $self->{current_myset_set} = shift(@all_db_sets);
01193       }
01194     
01195     ##  These directories will have individual buttons
01196     %problib = %{$ce->{courseFiles}{problibs}} if $ce->{courseFiles}{problibs};
01197 
01198     my $userName = $r->param('user');
01199     my $user = $db->getUser($userName); # checked 
01200     die "record for user $userName (real user) does not exist." 
01201         unless defined $user;
01202     my $authz = $r->authz;
01203     unless ($authz->hasPermissions($userName, "modify_problem_sets")) {
01204         return(""); # Error message already produced in the body
01205     }
01206 
01207     ## Now one action we have to deal with here
01208     if ($r->param('edit_local')) {
01209         my $urlpath = $r->urlpath;
01210         my $db = $r->db;
01211         my $checkset = $db->getGlobalSet($r->param('local_sets'));
01212         if (not defined($checkset)) {
01213             $self->{error} = 1;
01214             $self->addbadmessage('You need to select a "Target Set" before you can edit it.');
01215         } else {
01216             my $page = $urlpath->newFromModule('WeBWorK::ContentGenerator::Instructor::ProblemSetDetail', $r, setID=>$r->param('local_sets'), courseID=>$urlpath->arg("courseID"));
01217             my $url = $self->systemLink($page);
01218             $self->reply_with_redirect($url);
01219         }
01220     }
01221 
01222     ## Next, lots of set up so that errors can be reported with message()
01223 
01224     ############# List of problems we have already printed
01225 
01226     $self->{past_problems} = get_past_problem_files($r);
01227     # if we don't end up reusing problems, this will be wiped out
01228     # if we do redisplay the same problems, we must adjust this accordingly
01229     my @past_marks = map {$_->[1]} @{$self->{past_problems}};
01230     my $none_shown = scalar(@{$self->{past_problems}})==0;
01231     my @pg_files=();
01232     my @myset_files=();
01233     my $use_previous_problems = 1;
01234     my $first_shown = $r->param('first_shown') || 0;
01235     my $last_shown = $r->param('last_shown'); 
01236     if (not defined($last_shown)) {
01237         $last_shown = -1; 
01238     }
01239     my @all_past_list = (); # these are include requested, but not shown
01240     my $j = 0;
01241     while (defined($r->param("all_past_list$j"))) {
01242         push @all_past_list, $r->param("all_past_list$j");
01243         $j++;
01244     }
01245 
01246     ############# Default of which problem selector to display
01247 
01248     my $browse_which = $r->param('browse_which') || 'browse_npl_library';
01249     my $gridded = $r->param('gridify') || 'false';
01250 
01251     
01252 
01253     ## check for problem lib buttons
01254     my $browse_lib = '';
01255     foreach my $lib (keys %problib) {
01256         if ($r->param("browse_$lib")) {
01257             $browse_lib = "browse_$lib";
01258             last;
01259         }
01260     }
01261 
01262 
01263     ########### Start the logic through if elsif elsif ...
01264     debug("browse_lib", $r->param("$browse_lib"));
01265     debug("browse_npl_library", $r->param("browse_npl_library"));
01266     debug("edit_mysets", $r->param("edit_mysets"));
01267     debug("browse_setdefs", $r->param("browse_setdefs"));
01268     ##### Asked to browse certain problems
01269     if ($browse_lib ne '') {
01270         $browse_which = $browse_lib;
01271         $self->{current_library_set} = "";
01272         $use_previous_problems = 0; @pg_files = (); ## clear old problems
01273     } elsif ($r->param('browse_npl_library')) {
01274         $browse_which = 'browse_npl_library';
01275         $self->{current_library_set} = "";
01276         $use_previous_problems = 0; @pg_files = (); ## clear old problems
01277     } elsif ($r->param('browse_local')) {
01278         $browse_which = 'browse_local';
01279         #$self->{current_library_set} = "";
01280         $use_previous_problems = 0; @pg_files = (); ## clear old problems
01281     } elsif ($r->param('edit_mysets')) {
01282         $browse_which = 'edit_mysets';
01283         $self->{current_library_set} = "";
01284         $use_previous_problems = 0; @pg_files = (); ## clear old problems
01285     } elsif ($r->param('browse_setdefs')) {
01286         $browse_which = 'browse_setdefs';
01287         $self->{current_library_set} = "";
01288         $use_previous_problems = 0; @pg_files = (); ## clear old problems
01289 
01290         ##### Change the seed value
01291 
01292     } elsif ($r->param('rerandomize')) {
01293         $self->{problem_seed}= 1+$self->{problem_seed};
01294         #$r->param('problem_seed', $problem_seed);
01295         $self->addbadmessage('Changing the problem seed for display, but there are no problems showing.') if $none_shown;
01296 
01297         ##### Clear the display
01298 
01299     } elsif ($r->param('cleardisplay')) {
01300         @pg_files = ();
01301         $use_previous_problems=0;
01302         $self->addbadmessage('The display was already cleared.') if $none_shown;
01303 
01304         ##### View problems selected from the local list
01305 
01306     } elsif ($r->param('view_local_set')) {
01307 
01308         my $set_to_display = $self->{current_library_set};
01309         if (not defined($set_to_display) or $set_to_display eq SELECT_LOCAL_STRING or $set_to_display eq "Found no directories containing problems") {
01310             $self->addbadmessage('You need to select a set to view.');
01311         } else {
01312             $set_to_display = '.' if $set_to_display eq MY_PROBLEMS;
01313             $set_to_display = substr($browse_which,7) if $set_to_display eq MAIN_PROBLEMS;
01314             @pg_files = list_pg_files($ce->{courseDirs}->{templates},
01315                 "$set_to_display");
01316             $use_previous_problems=0;
01317         }
01318 
01319         ##### View problems selected from the a set in this course
01320   } elsif ($r->param('edit_mysets_set')){
01321   
01322     my $set_to_display = $self->{current_library_set};
01323           debug("set_to_display is $set_to_display");
01324           if (not defined($set_to_display) 
01325                 or $set_to_display eq "Select a Homework Set"
01326                 or $set_to_display eq NO_LOCAL_SET_STRING) {
01327             $self->addbadmessage("You need to select a set from this course to view.");
01328           } else {
01329             # DBFIXME don't use ID list, use an iterator
01330             my @problemList = $db->listGlobalProblems($set_to_display);
01331             my $problem;
01332             @pg_files=();
01333             for $problem (@problemList) {
01334                 my $problemRecord = $db->getGlobalProblem($set_to_display, $problem); # checked
01335                 die "global $problem for set $set_to_display not found." unless
01336                     $problemRecord;
01337                 push @pg_files, $problemRecord->source_file;
01338   
01339             }
01340             @pg_files = sortByName(undef,@pg_files);
01341             $use_previous_problems=0;
01342           }
01343 
01344         ##### View from the library database
01345  
01346     } elsif ($r->param('lib_view')) {
01347         @pg_files=();
01348         my @dbsearch = WeBWorK::Utils::ListingDB::getSectionListings($r);
01349         my ($result, $tolibpath);
01350         for $result (@dbsearch) {
01351             $tolibpath = "Library/$result->{path}/$result->{filename}";
01352             
01353             ## Too clunky!!!!
01354             push @pg_files, $tolibpath;
01355         }
01356         $use_previous_problems=0; 
01357 
01358         ##### View a set from a set*.def
01359 
01360     } elsif ($r->param('view_setdef_set')) {
01361 
01362         my $set_to_display = $self->{current_library_set};
01363         debug("set_to_display is $set_to_display");
01364         if (not defined($set_to_display) 
01365                 or $set_to_display eq "Select a Set Definition File"
01366                 or $set_to_display eq NO_LOCAL_SET_STRING) {
01367             $self->addbadmessage("You need to select a set definition file to view.");
01368         } else {
01369             @pg_files= $self->read_set_def($set_to_display);
01370         }
01371         $use_previous_problems=0; 
01372 
01373         ##### Edit the current local homework set
01374 
01375     } elsif ($r->param('edit_local')) { ## Jump to set edit page
01376 
01377         ; # already handled
01378 
01379 
01380         ##### Make a new local homework set
01381 
01382     } elsif ($r->param('new_local_set')) {
01383         if ($r->param('new_set_name') !~ /^[\w .-]*$/) {
01384             $self->addbadmessage("The name ".$r->param('new_set_name')." is not a valid set name.  Use only letters, digits, -, _, and .");
01385         } else {
01386             my $newSetName = $r->param('new_set_name');
01387             # if we want to munge the input set name, do it here
01388             $newSetName =~ s/\s/_/g;
01389             debug("local_sets was ", $r->param('local_sets'));
01390             $r->param('local_sets',$newSetName);  ## use of two parameter param
01391             debug("new value of local_sets is ", $r->param('local_sets'));
01392             my $newSetRecord     = $db->getGlobalSet($newSetName);
01393             if (defined($newSetRecord)) {
01394                 $self->addbadmessage("The set name $newSetName is already in use.  
01395                 Pick a different name if you would like to start a new set.");
01396             } else {            # Do it!
01397                 # DBFIXME use $db->newGlobalSet
01398                 $newSetRecord = $db->{set}->{record}->new();
01399                 $newSetRecord->set_id($newSetName);
01400                 $newSetRecord->set_header("defaultHeader");
01401                 $newSetRecord->hardcopy_header("defaultHeader");
01402                 $newSetRecord->open_date(time()+60*60*24*7); # in one week
01403                 $newSetRecord->due_date(time()+60*60*24*7*2); # in two weeks
01404                 $newSetRecord->answer_date(time()+60*60*24*7*3); # in three weeks
01405                 eval {$db->addGlobalSet($newSetRecord)};
01406                 if ($@) {
01407                     $self->addbadmessage("Problem creating set $newSetName<br> $@");
01408                 } else {
01409                     $self->addgoodmessage("Set $newSetName has been created.");
01410                     my $selfassign = $r->param('selfassign') || "";
01411                     $selfassign = "" if($selfassign =~ /false/i); # deal with javascript false
01412                     if($selfassign) {
01413                         $self->assignSetToUser($userName, $newSetRecord);
01414                         $self->addgoodmessage("Set $newSetName was assigned to $userName.");
01415                     }
01416                 }
01417             }
01418         }
01419 
01420         ##### Add selected problems to the current local set
01421 
01422     } elsif ($r->param('update')) {
01423       
01424         ## first handle problems to be added before we hide them
01425         my($localSet, @selected);
01426 
01427         my @add_pg_files = grep {(($_->[1] & ADDED)) != 0 } @{$self->{past_problems}}; 
01428         my @add_selected = map {$_->[0]} @add_pg_files;
01429         
01430         my @delete_pg_files = grep {(($_->[1] & DELETED)) != 0} @{$self->{past_problems}};
01431         my @delete_selected = map {$_->[0]} @delete_pg_files;
01432         
01433         my @move_pg_files = grep {(($_->[1] & MOVED)) != 0} @{$self->{past_problems}};
01434         my @move_selected = map {$_->[0]} @move_pg_files;
01435 
01436         my @action_files = grep {$_->[1] > 0 } @{$self->{past_problems}};
01437         # There are now good reasons to do an update without selecting anything.
01438         #if(scalar(@action_files) == 0) {
01439         #    $self->addbadmessage('Update requested, but no problems were marked.');
01440         #}
01441         if (scalar(@add_selected)>0) {  # if some are to be added, they need a place to go
01442             $localSet = $r->param('myset_sets');
01443             if (not defined($localSet) or 
01444                     $localSet eq SELECT_SET_STRING or 
01445                     $localSet eq NO_LOCAL_SET_STRING) {
01446                 $self->addbadmessage('You are trying to add problems to something, 
01447                 but you did not select a "Target Set" name as a target.');
01448             } else {
01449                 my $newSetRecord  = $db->getGlobalSet($localSet);
01450                 if (not defined($newSetRecord)) {
01451                     $self->addbadmessage("You are trying to add problems to $localSet, 
01452                     but that set does not seem to exist!  I bet you used your \"Back\" button.");
01453                 } else {
01454                     my $addcount = add_selected($self, $db, $localSet);
01455                     if($addcount > 0) {
01456                         $self->addgoodmessage("Added $addcount problem".(($addcount>1)?'s':'').
01457                             " to $localSet.");
01458                     }
01459                 }
01460             }
01461         }
01462         if (scalar(@delete_selected)>0) {   # if some are to be added, they need a place to go
01463             $localSet = $r->param('myset_sets');
01464             if (not defined($localSet) or 
01465                     $localSet eq SELECT_SET_STRING or 
01466                     $localSet eq NO_LOCAL_SET_STRING) {
01467                 $self->addbadmessage('You are trying to add problems to something, 
01468                 but you did not select a "Target Set" name as a target.');
01469             } else {
01470                 my $newSetRecord  = $db->getGlobalSet($localSet);
01471                 if (not defined($newSetRecord)) {
01472                     $self->addbadmessage("You are trying to delete problems to $localSet, 
01473                     but that set does not seem to exist!  I bet you used your \"Back\" button.");
01474                 } else {
01475                     my $deletecount = delete_selected($self, $db, $localSet);
01476                     if($deletecount > 0) {
01477                         $self->addgoodmessage("Deleted $deletecount problem".(($deletecount>1)?'s':'').
01478                             " to $localSet.");
01479                     }
01480                 }
01481             }
01482         }
01483         if (scalar(@move_selected)>0) { # if some are to be added, they need a place to go
01484             $localSet = $r->param('myset_sets');
01485             my $otherSet = $self->{current_library_set};
01486             if (not defined($localSet) or not defined($otherSet) or
01487                     $localSet eq SELECT_SET_STRING or 
01488                     $localSet eq NO_LOCAL_SET_STRING) {
01489                 $self->addbadmessage('You are trying to add problems to something, 
01490                 but you did not select a "Target Set" name as a target.');
01491             } else {
01492                 my $newSetRecord  = $db->getGlobalSet($localSet);
01493                 my $otherNewSetRecord = $db->getGlobalSet($otherSet);
01494                 if (not defined($newSetRecord) or not defined($otherNewSetRecord)) {
01495                     $self->addbadmessage("You are trying to move problems from $otherSet to $localSet, 
01496                     but that set does not seem to exist!  I bet you used your \"Back\" button.");
01497                 } else {
01498                     my $addcount = add_selected($self, $db, $localSet);
01499                     my $deletecount = delete_selected($self, $db, $otherSet);
01500                     if($addcount > 0 && $deletecount > 0) {
01501                         $self->addgoodmessage("Moved $addcount problem".(($addcount>1)?'s':'').
01502                             " from $otherSet to $localSet.");
01503                     }
01504                 }
01505             }
01506         }
01507         ## now handle problems to be hidden
01508 
01509         ## only keep the ones which are not hidden
01510         @pg_files = grep {($_->[1] & HIDDEN) ==0 } @{$self->{past_problems}};
01511         @pg_files = grep {(($_->[1] & DELETED)) != 0 } @pg_files;
01512         @past_marks = map {$_->[1]} @pg_files;
01513         @pg_files = map {$_->[0]} @pg_files;
01514         @all_past_list = (@all_past_list[0..($first_shown-1)],
01515                     @pg_files,
01516                     @all_past_list[($last_shown+1)..(scalar(@all_past_list)-1)]);
01517         $last_shown = $first_shown+$maxShown -1; debug("last_shown 3: ", $last_shown);
01518         $last_shown = (scalar(@all_past_list)-1) if($last_shown>=scalar(@all_past_list)); debug("last_shown 4: ", $last_shown);
01519         
01520         #want to reorder in addition to anything else
01521     if ($r->param('isReordered')){
01522     #this might work, i'm not sure if this is the right ID
01523       reorderProblems($self, $db, $r->param('myset_sets'), $r);
01524     }
01525 
01526     } elsif ($r->param('next_page')) {
01527         $first_shown = $last_shown+1;
01528         $last_shown = $first_shown+$maxShown-1; debug("last_shown 5: ", $last_shown);
01529         $last_shown = (scalar(@all_past_list)-1) if($last_shown>=scalar(@all_past_list)); debug("last_shown 6: ", $last_shown);
01530         $self->addgoodmessage("It sees the next_page parameter, last shown is: $last_shown and first shown is: $first_shown");
01531         @past_marks = ();
01532     } elsif ($r->param('prev_page')) {
01533         $last_shown = $first_shown-1; 
01534         $first_shown = $last_shown - $maxShown+1;
01535 
01536         $first_shown = 0 if($first_shown<0);
01537         @past_marks = ();
01538 
01539     } elsif ($r->param('select_all')) {
01540         @past_marks = map {1} @past_marks;
01541     } elsif ($r->param('library_basic')) {
01542         $library_basic = 1;
01543         for my $jj (qw(textchapter textsection textbook)) {
01544             $r->param('library_'.$jj,'');
01545         }
01546     } elsif ($r->param('library_advanced')) {
01547         $library_basic = 2;
01548     } elsif ($r->param('library_reset')) {
01549         for my $jj (qw(chapters sections subjects textbook keywords)) {
01550             $r->param('library_'.$jj,'');
01551         }
01552     } elsif ($r->param('select_none')) {
01553         @past_marks = ();
01554     } else {
01555         #nothing
01556     }               ##### end of the if elsif ...
01557 
01558   #I'm worried this will break something
01559   my $default_set = $self->{current_myset_set};
01560       #debug("set_to_display is $default_set");
01561       if (not defined($default_set) 
01562         or $default_set eq "Select a Homework Set"
01563         or $default_set eq NO_LOCAL_SET_STRING) {
01564         $self->addbadmessage("You need to select a set from this course to view.");
01565     } else {
01566         # DBFIXME don't use ID list, use an iterator
01567         my @problemList = $db->listGlobalProblems($default_set);
01568         my $problem;
01569         @myset_files=();
01570         for $problem (@problemList) {
01571             my $problemRecord = $db->getGlobalProblem($default_set, $problem); # checked
01572             die "global $problem for set $default_set not found." unless
01573                 $problemRecord;
01574             push @myset_files, $problemRecord->source_file;
01575   
01576         }
01577       #@myset_files = sortByName(undef,@myset_files);
01578     }
01579  
01580     ############# List of local sets
01581 
01582     # DBFIXME sorting in database, please!
01583     my @all_db_sets = $db->listGlobalSets;
01584     @all_db_sets = sortByName(undef, @all_db_sets);
01585 
01586     if ($use_previous_problems) {
01587         @pg_files = @all_past_list;
01588     } else {
01589         $first_shown = 0;
01590         $last_shown = scalar(@pg_files)<$maxShown ? scalar(@pg_files) : $maxShown; 
01591         $last_shown--;      # to make it an array index
01592         @past_marks = ();
01593     }
01594     ############# Now store data in self for retreival by body
01595     $self->{first_shown} = $first_shown;
01596     $self->{last_shown} = $last_shown;
01597     $self->{browse_which} = $browse_which;
01598     $self->{gridded} = $gridded;
01599     #$self->{problem_seed} = $problem_seed;
01600     $self->{pg_files} = \@pg_files;
01601     $self->{myset_files} = \@myset_files;
01602     $self->{past_marks} = \@past_marks;
01603     $self->{all_db_sets} = \@all_db_sets;
01604     $self->{library_basic} = $library_basic;
01605     debug("past_marks is ", join(" ", @{$self->{past_marks}}));
01606 }

01889                 my $urlpath = $r->urlpath;
01890             my $getProblemPath = $self->systemLink($urlpath->newFromModule("WeBWorK::ContentGenerator::Instructor::GetLibrarySetProblems", $r, courseID =>$urlpath->arg("courseID")));
01891               $prev_button = "<span><button type='button' onclick='viewProblems(\"prev_page\" ,\"mainform\", \"".$r->uri."\", \"prev_spinner\");'>Previous page</button><img id='prev_spinner' style='display:none;' src='/webwork2_files/images/ajax-loader-small.gif'></img></span>";
01892             }
01893             if ((1+$last_shown)<scalar(@pg_files)) {
01894                 #$next_button = CGI::submit(-name=>"next_page", -style=>"width:15ex", -value=>"Next page");
01895                 my $urlpath = $r->urlpath;
01896             my $getProblemPath = $self->systemLink($urlpath->newFromModule("WeBWorK::ContentGenerator::Instructor::GetLibrarySetProblems", $r, courseID =>$urlpath->arg("courseID")));
01897               $next_button = "<span><button type='button' onclick='viewProblems(\"next_page\" ,\"mainform\", \"".$r->uri."\", \"next_spinner\");'>Next page</button><img id='next_spinner' style='display:none;' src='/webwork2_files/images/ajax-loader-small.gif'></img></span>";
01898             }
01899             if (scalar(@pg_files)>0) {
01900                 print CGI::p(($first_shown+1)."-".($last_shown+1)." of ".scalar(@pg_files)." shown.", $prev_button, " ", $next_button,
01901                   '<span><button type="button" style="float:right;" onclick="saveChanges(\'mainform\', \''.$r->uri.'\', \'save_changes_spinner2\');">save changes</button><img id="save_changes_spinner2" style="display:none;float:right;" src="/webwork2_files/images/ajax-loader-small.gif"></img></span>');
01902             }
01903             #close setmaker_library_data
01904             print '</div>';
01905             #close setmaker_library
01906           print '</div>';
01907         #close problem_container
01908         print '</div>';
01909       print CGI::endform(), "\n";
01910       #close form-editor
01911     print '</div>';
01912     print '<div style="clear:both;"></div>';
01913     #    if($first_shown>0 or (1+$last_shown)<scalar(@pg_files)) {
01914     
01915     #    }
01916     # end big wrapper div that will hopefully fix theme issues
01917   print '</div>';
01918     return "";  
01919 }
